item.title: vSphere 6.5 - Top KB Articles for Upgrade Prep
item.description: Here are the top KB articles for upgrading to vSphere 6.5: KB 2146420 – Estimating vCenter Server 5.5 to vCenter Server Appliance 6.x migration time KB 2147711 – Estimating vCenter Server 5.5 or 6.0 to vCenter Server Appliance 6.5 migration time KB 2112283 – Regenerate vCenter Certificates KB 2147548 – Important information before upgrading to vSphere 6.5 KB 2147686 – vCenter Server 6.5 upgrade best practices KB 2147824 – Migrating VMFS 5 datastore to VMFS 6 datastore KB 2147289 – Update Sequence for vSphere 6.
